name: Shivanshi
greetingText: I wanted to create something special in an engineer's style, so here it is hope you'll like it !
wishText: All the best for your exams and an unforgettable year ahead. I am sure they will be good ! ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy returns of the day blah blah blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: I remember the first time I saw you, it felt like my life stopped in that moment, as if everything around me disappeared. We’ve been talking for the last 10 years, yet somehow, I still can’t seem to make it into the list of your friends. It’s like I’m not fortunate enough to be someone you consider close, and it truly saddens me. I know I’ve probably lost a lot of my self-respect trying to hold onto something that feels so out of reach, but this is just how I am. I don’t want to lose the connections I have with people, especially those I care about. I’ve always believed that if I kept trying, if I kept putting in the effort, one day you’d see me and recognize what I felt, but I realize now I’ve lost that hope. I really wish you could’ve given me just one chance. I swear, if you had, I would’ve moved mountains for you, I would’ve given you the world. :(
replayText: I wish things would have ended better
